Title: Fish Market Rows
EnterText: Slabs drip; gulls argue from beam to beam.
Description: Fishmongers trade news and knives with equal quickness.
Paragraphs: Rows of slabs shine with scales and ice. Gulls argue from beam to beam while boys swab guts into wicker baskets.
Hand-bells ring prices; a sharper ring marks the start of a brawl that stalls as fast as it starts - no one wants to buy from a broken jaw.
